text: Ilium/Olympos is a science fiction series that was written by Dan Simmons. The events in the books are set in motion by beings who have taken on the roles of the Greek gods. The first book in the series, Illium received the Locus Award for best book in 2004. == Books == There are two books in the series: * Ilium (2003) - Locus Award 2004 * Olympos (2005) Category:Science fiction books
title: Ilium/Olympos
